name: Quatro
description:
Quatro is a 2D puzzle-platformer with 5 levels.

Each level represents four dimentions in only one screen. To win, you must eat all four cupcakes in each level. May the feast begin.

Instructions

You win the level if you collect all cupcakes.
You control 4 characters with only one set of controllers.
You lose the level if any of the characters die (beware the spikes).

Jump -> "W" / Up arrow / Spacebar
Walk -> "A", "D" / Left arrow, Right arrow

ESC to go back to the menu.

Credits

Programming/Game Design -> José Ribeiro

Art/Game Design -> Beatriz Abreu
